page.title: 12BURTON NEWS IN JUNE, 1985
page.content: { WOMENS INSTITUTE MEETING. { }The guest speaker for the month gave an interesting talk on photography and showed some slides.The following week they went to Honeyborough pottery and that was followed by a Marina walk and a meal at the new Buffers Restaraunt. { { BURTON COUNTY COUNCIL. } At the Burton County Council meeting they discussed how to improve the village. It was reported that this year there would not be enough money to improve the safety of the road at Bowlings Corner. There was a discussion about public footpaths because there was an obstruction from Ashdale to Dumple Dale and it has been agreed that the County Council be asked to remove it.
